definition: to be obsessed/to be possessed
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
to bewilder/crazy about/fan/enthusiast/lost/confused
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
hole/opening/orifice (of the human body)/(fig.) key (to the solution of a problem)

sentences.english: She had never been so crushed.
sentences.chinese: 她從來沒有這麼鬼迷心竅過。

sentences.english: Nowadays, many girls seem to have a bee in their bonnets and they are determined to marry foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 最近許多女孩都鬼迷心竅似的一心只想嫁個外國人。

sentences.english: She must have been possessed, to attack her own mother.
sentences.chinese: 她準是鬼迷心竅，竟然打自己的媽媽。

sentences.english: You must either be mad or utterly depraved and wicked.
sentences.chinese: 你一定是瘋了，要不就是中了邪，鬼迷心竅。
